pkoi_net: Human-specific Protein Knowledge-Graph

pkoi_net.Rd

A pre-computed, undirected heterogeneous knowledge-graph that integrates proteomic, genomic and functional annotations for network-aware omics analyses with the pkoi package.

Usage

data(pkoi_net)

Format

An `igraph` object with 404,325 vertices and 7,736,042 edges.

Vertex attributes

name, labels, identifier, network statistics pre-calculated for fast querying: degree, coreness, betweenness, closeness, constraint, eccentricity, eigen_centrality, transitivity.

Edge attribute

edge_type – relationship type (character).

Source

Internal integration of SPOKE (Baranzini Lab) filtered for human-specific entities and enriched with protein-centric annotations (last updated July 2025).

Details

The object is an [`igraph`][igraph::igraph] whose vertices represent biological entities (e.g. proteins, genes, pathways), and whose edges encode experimentally supported or database-derived relationships (e.g. UPREGULATES, PARTOF, REACTION).

Vertex label distribution (18 node types)
